subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Kenny Britt, a junior wide receiver, announced Saturday that he would bypass his senior season with Rutgers and enter the N.F.L. draft. The 6-foot-4, 215-pound Britt led the Big East this season with 87 catches for 1,371 yards. He scored seven touchdowns. Rutgers won its last seven games to finish 8-5.
